RECENT POSTS

Summary of Week One

Post by Paul Muldoon, Aug 19, 2023 at 17:32 BST.
Web App Development

The first week of learning was amazing! Our first topic was databases. We learned how to design a database and then create and query it using SQL! This was very useful in refreshing my memory as my last database project was a number of months ago

RECENT POSTS

My First Day at Kainos!

Post by Paul Muldoon, Aug 14, 2023 at 19:24 BST.
Social

My first day at Kainos is a wrap! It was so much fun meeting my colleagues, hearing about what's to come and seeing the office for the first time. We had pizza and even went on a trip to an escape room to finish up, so much fun!

The Start of My Blog

Post by Paul Muldoon, Aug 14, 2023 at 08:47 BST
Social

Today is the day i start my new job as a Placement Software Engineer at Kainos in Belfast! I have created this blog to document my experience and all the new things i learn along the way
